verses.text: Ach wuninal, tato tzak'och a b'a a majnan k'een tumin yuj junok ch'oc animail t'a junok etchonhab',
wan ak'anem a yaalil, ol cotcan t'a ib'anh yuj b'aj ix ak'och a b'a chi'.

Ach wuninal, icha tik tzutej a colanel a b'ha t'a yol sk'ab' winh aj tumin chi'. Ixic, emnaquil tzutej a b'a tzach tewi t'a winh, tza k'anan niwank'olal a b'ha t'a winh yic max ach yak' pural winh a tupanel sb'oc winh b'aj ix ak'och a b'a chi'.
Smoj wal maxtzac ach way yuj, mocxob' ik' ip junok rato
masanto tzach el t'a yalanh, icha wal yel junok nok' k'ultaquil chej t'a junok mach pechjinac, ma icha yel junok nok' much t'a junok yaal.
Ach anima malaj a gana a munlaji, ilnab' nok' ch'equem, sik'lab'il tzila' tas syutej nok' smunlaji yic tz'ilchaj swael nok', scham wal a k'ayb'an t'a nok'.
Wach'chom malaj mach schecan munlaj nok', malaj yajal nok' tz'alan yab' tas sk'ulej,
palta ayic stiempoan swael nok', syak' wal yip nok' smunlaji yic smolancan swael nok' chi'.
Ach anima malaj a gana a munlaji, k'ocb'ilxo chi' tzach wayi. k'ocb'ilxo chi' tzach ek' jichan.
Yacb'an scot numumoc a wayanh, snecnecan a jolom, jeljumb'a tz'aj a k'ab', te wach' tz'aj a wayi,
haxo tz'aji, scot mheb'ail t'a ib'anh, ste b'at t'a ib'anh icha junok winh elk'um ed'jinac junok k'een cuchilub'.
Ha heb' chuk spensar, anhej es tzek' yal heb' t'a skal heb' anima.
Smutz'mutz'an sat heb' yak'an yechel, sch'oxanpax heb' yet' yiximal sk'ab'.
Junelnhej te chuk spensar heb', axonhej malaj swach'il sna sk'ulej heb'. Ha b'aj tzek' heb', anhej owal sq'ekan waan yuj heb'.
Yuj chi' elanhchamel ol ja yaelal t'a yib'anh heb'. Junnhej mutz'satil ol aj slajwiem heb', manhxa tas ol yal yuj heb'.

Ay uque' tas chacb'ilel yuj Jehov√° t'a junelnhej: Aton ik'ojchanhb'ail, esalwumal, mak'ojcham anima malaj smul, naojchaanh tas malaj swach'il, chukal sk'ulaji, ak'ojoch es t'a yib'anh junocxo mach yet' ik'ojchaanh owal t'a skal anima.
Ach wuninal, sik'kan juntzanh in k'ayb'ub'al tik t'a a pensar yet' a k'ayb'ub'al syak' ix a nun.
Sik'kan t'a a pensar, naannhejocab' uuj t'a masanil tiempo.
Ha ol ach cuchb'an b'aj ol ach ek'oc, manh ol ach xiwoc ayic ol ach wayoc. Ayic ol el a wayanh, anheja' juntzanh tik naan uuj.
D'a wal yel a a cachnab'il yet' a k'ayb'ub'al tik, icha sacq'uinal yaj t'ayach. Ha a cachnab'il chi' yet' a pensar tzach cuchb'anb'at t'a sb'eal k 'inal.
Ha ol ach colanel t'a yol sk'ab' ix ix chuk spensar yet' ix ayxo winh yetb'eyum to te wach' smontan yet' slolonel.
Manh ak'och a pensar t'a swach'il yilji ix, manh a cha somchajel a k'ool yuj chajtil tzach aj yilanoch ix.
Ha mach smulan yet' ix ajmul ix, scot mheb'ail t'a yib'anh, haxo mach smontaj yuj ix ay yetb'eyum yic smulan ix yet'oc, syik'cot chamel t'a yib'anh.
Q'uinaloc ay junok mach tz'ik'anb'at te' tzak'ak' t'a snhi' sk'ool, max ek'b'atlaj stz'ab'at spichul yuj te'.
Ha mach sb'ey t'a yib'anh te' tzak'ak', max ek'b'atlaj stz'ab'at yoc yuj te'.
Ha mach smulan yet' ix ix ay yetb'eyum chi', yowalil scot t'a yib'anh.
Tato ay junok elk'um tz'elk'an junok tasi yujto ay swejel, tzato naji wal t'a yib'anh,
palta wach'chom icha chi', tato syamchaji, yowalil uquel tz'aj stupan tas ix yelk'ej chi', taxonhej manhxalaj tas skan t'ay.
Tato ay mach tzek' yet' ix ayxo winh yetb'eyum, yelxo wal malaj jab'oc spensar. Ha mach icha chi' sk'ulej, anhej syak' lajwoc sb'a.
Ol scha syaelal, ol mak'jocpaxi, manhxa b'ak'uinh ol b'at sq'uixwelal chi' satk'olal yuj heb' anima.
Ha winh ix ixtaj ix yetb'eyum chi', te ov winh icha te tzak'ak', manh jab'oc syak' niwank'olal winh ayic sk'och stiempoal yak'anek' spak winh.
Ha silab' winh ay smul chi' syak' t'a winh, max schalaj winh, wach'chom te niwan silab' chi', palta max yak'laj niwank'olal winh.
